resources.string:
Add the goal for the goal you want to track here.

You can set the name of your goal and how often you want to reach it here. I recommend to start with a small goal and build a habit of feeling a sense of accomplishment when clicking the goal and seeing that it's green afterwards.

Have fun reaching your goal!
How often do you want to reach your goal? Every
Super awesome that you downloaded WorkoutPixel.\n\nTo start using it, go to your homescreen and add your first WorkoutPixel goal.
You have defined goals that currently don\'t have a widget. You can connect the widget to one of those goals. This takes over all its data including the history.
Do you want to show when you reached your goal the last time?
There is no goal for this goal. You can add a new goal to your homescreen and connect it to this goal.
There is no goal for this goal. The app keeps the data because more often than not, a goal gets removed by accident. You can add a new goal to your homescreen and connect it to this goal.
